department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Invitation to Qualify for concrete restoration and railing replacement
description: This is the Phase 2 solicitation following an Invitation to Qualify. Only qualified suppliers have been invited to bid.
full_summary:
## Invitation to Qualify (ITT) - EZ899-241045 Concrete Stair and Sidewalk Restoration, and Railing Replacement
### English Version

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is issuing an Invitation to Qualify (ITT) for the EZ899-241045 Concrete Stair and Sidewalk Restoration, and Railing Replacement project, Phase 2.

#### Solicitation Details
- **Solicitation Number:** #WS4288884641
- **Publication Date:** Tuesday, 2023-12-06
- **Tender Closing Date:** Monday, 2024-01-08 14:00 (EST)

#### Tender Overview
The PSTC is seeking qualified suppliers to provide concrete stair and sidewalk restoration and railing replacement services for various government buildings.

#### Contact Information
- **Contact Person:** Michaela Costa (SPAC/PSPC)
- **Email:** [michaela.costa@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:michaela.costa@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
- **Phone:** (not assigned)
- **Fax:** (not assigned)

#### Notice Details
- **Publication Date:** Tuesday, 2023-12-06
- **Tender Closing Date:** Monday, 2024-01-08 14:00 EST

#### Contract Details
- **Contract Start Date:** Tuesday, 2024-01-09
- **Contract End Date:** Sunday, 2024-05-31

#### Important
Qualification is competitive and suppliers will be invited to participate, based on their expertise and experience in the relevant area.

---

## Invitation à la qualification (ITQ) - EZ889-241045 Réparation du trottoir et des marches de béton et remplacement des garde-corps
### Version Français

Le ministère des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux (TPSGB) émet une invitation à la qualification (ITQ) pour le projet EZ889-241045 Réparation du trottoir et des marches de béton et remplacement des garde-corps, phase 2.

#### Détails de l’appel
- **Numéro de sollicitation**: #WS4288884641
- **Date de publication**: Mardi 2023-12-06
- **Date limite d’inscription**: Lundi 2024-01-08 14h00 (HAE)

####
